game.name: SkyCraft
game.genres: 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Skycraft is an open-world survival game for 1-10 players, set in infinite procedurally-generated floating islands.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Skycraft is an open-world survival game for 1-10 players, set in infinite procedurally-generated floating islands.
